svg/icon-filter:
<svg width="20" height="11" viewBox="0 0 20 11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation">
  <g fill="#FFF" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <path d="M0 0h20v1H0zM3 5h14v1H3zM7 10h6v1H7z"/>
  </g>
</svg>
svg/icon-dropdown:
<svg width="6" height="3" viewBox="0 0 6 3" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M6 0L3 3 0 0h6z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
</svg>
components/product-catalog/shop-by-price:
{{#each shop_by}}
  • {{low.formatted}} - {{high.formatted}}
    • {{/each}}
components/product-catalog/shop-by-brand:
{{#each shop_by}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • {{lang 'link-list.view_brands'}}
components/product-catalog/sort: {{#if result_count}} {{/if}}
svg/icon-star-full:
<svg class="icon-star-full" width="15" height="14" viewBox="0 0 15 14" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation">
  <path d="M7.083 11.374l4.38 2.302-.837-4.876 3.543-3.454-4.898-.71L7.082.197l-2.19 4.437-4.895.71L3.54 8.8l-.837 4.876" fill-rule="nonzero" fill="currentColor"/>
</svg>
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc: {{#each items}} {{> components/faceted-search/facet-list-item}} {{/each}} {{#if show_more_toggle}} {{> components/faceted-search/facet-toggle-more}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range: {{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#each items}}
  • {{> components/reviews/ratings rating=param_value}} {{{lang 'faceted_search.and_up'}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}}
    ({{lang 'faceted_search.num_items' count=count}})
    {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi: {{#each items}} {{> components/faceted-search/facet-list-item}} {{/each}} {{#if show_more_toggle}} {{> components/faceted-search/facet-toggle-more}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facet-list-ite: • {{> svg/icon-checkmark}} {{title}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{count}}) {{/if}}
svg/icon-checkmark:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
  <path class="checkmark" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M1 8l5 6 9-11" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"/>
</svg>
